text:
Hi everyone :slightly_smiling_face:
I’m wondering how to add a specific font (Poppins) in HubSpot in order to use it on my landing pages ?
I’m using a free template.
Thanks for your help !

Hey everyone! Looking to see if it's possible to add a value to the HubSpot default meetings module. I've gone ahead and cloned it, I am using the cloned version on a thank you page where I am passing `firstName` `lastName` & `email` in local storage from a previous form fill to try and pre-populate the meetings form.

I tried something like this, but no luck:
```document.getElementsByClassName('text')[0].setAttribute('data-src', 'MEETING_URL?firstName={{firstName}}"&lastname="{{lastName}}"&email="+email')```
(The reason I can't pass it directly on the page URL where the meeting module is on is due to data compliance issues on Ad Networks)
